title: Our time

abstract: 'When dad walks through the front door every night, we all know it's time for dinner.'
description: For Evangelos Thiveos, time with the family is centred around dinner time, where everyone gets to talk about their day, while 'stuffing their faces' with the copious amounts of food prepared earlier.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002273; Western stories : expressions for the future : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2008
